title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ted Nugent & Rep. Karen Whitsett | 4/24/20
description:
The day is here! Glenn announces the winners of the coveted Chairman Mao Coronavirus Dictators Awards! Michigan State Rep. Karen Whitsett gives an update after Detroit Democrats plan to censor her for thanking Trump. Musician Ted Nugent joins to stress the importance of self-sufficiency and his goal of helping more of the hunting community register to vote at HuntTheVote.org.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
